title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta until al dente.
Cook pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Mix hot pasta with pancetta, then quickly stir in egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken in a creamy tomato-based curry sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until golden.
Fry onions, add tomatoes and simmer.
Stir in cream, then add chicken.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of fresh vegetables tossed in a savory sauce.
instructions: Chop all vegetables evenly.
Heat oil in wok, add garlic.
Add vegetables and stir fry 5-7 minutes.
Pour soy sauce, toss well.
Serve with rice or noodles.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious Mexican-style tacos with seasoned beef and fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook beef and onion in pan until browned.
Add taco seasoning and mix well.
Warm taco shells.
Fill with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese.
Serve with salsa or guacamole.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup or fruit.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Whisk in milk and egg until smooth.
Heat butter in pan.
Pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing and croutons.
instructions: Wash and chop lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons and parmesan.
Mix well and serve cold.
